descriptionHtml:
[center][/center][center][img]http://i.imgur.com/FFyvErh.png[/img][i][font=Trebuchet MS][color=#d9ead3]Cerridwen does not know much about her past... She does know she was brought to the honorhall orphanage when she was very young and its where she has spent most of her life. Cerridwen now does not live in the orphanage anymore but has joined the thieves guild.[/color][/font][/i][i][font=Trebuchet MS][color=#d9ead3]Cerridwen yearns to leave Riften to go and adventure and is willing to follow anyone will is willing to take her. [/color][/font][/i][color=#d9ead3][i][font=Trebuchet MS](there is my horrible backstory Enjoy!)
[/font][/i]
[/color][i][font=Trebuchet MS]
[/font][/i]Name: Cerridwen 
Age: 19
Location: The Bee and barb
Riften Class: Mage
 She levels up with the player
You are able to marry her 
She Primarily uses lightning magic
Comes with the light foot perk so she won't trigger traps
[color=#d0e0e3][size=4]

[/size][/color][color=#d0e0e3][size=4]Permissions/credits[/size][/color][color=#d0e0e3][size=4]
